title: Chloe Ferry slammed after bragging about necking vodka from bottle in skimpy G-string
text:

Chloe Ferry has been slammed after bragging about necking vodka neat from the bottle in a black G-string.

The 24-year-old shared the party snap on Instagram from her recent Dubai beach break. It showed her slurping Grey Goose vodka from the bottle.

She simply captioned the shot with a Champagne emoji.

But fans took to Instagram to call out Chloe for setting a bad example to her younger followers about responsible drinking.

(Image: BACKGRID)

In comments which were later deleted, one fan fumed: "What sort of example are you setting to young girls who follow your account? You should be ashamed of yourself!"

Another added: "Why is Chloe swigging vodka in G-string? Try and find some self respect while your there."

Others leapt to Chloe's defence.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

One fan wrote: "To be fair if your old enough to be watching Geordie shore then you are old enough to make your own mind up tbh."

Another was distracted by her G-string, writing: Is it just me or does the bikini bottom look like one of those thongs you wear while getting a spray tan?"
description: Newly single Chloe shared a snap from her recent Dubai break - but some fans were left fuming
